title: General shot in Moscow conscious after surgery, Russian media say
desc: Lt Gen Vladimir Alexeyev was shot several times inside his apartment block on Friday morning.

title: Philippines prepares for Green Expo 2027 in Japan
desc: President Ferdinand Marcos Jr. created an inter-agency committee to facilitate preparations for the participation of the Philippines in the Green Expo 2027 in Japan, Malacañang said Saturday.

title: Eileen Gu overcomes an early fall in slopestyle to keep her Olympic dreams in tact
desc: Freeski star Eileen Gu has overcome a poor start by laying down a strong second run to qualify for the women’s slopestyle final at the Winter Olympics.

title: Bruno saw the future! Man Utd star Fernandes claims he knew Michael Carrick would be a 'great' manager after interim spell as Red Devils make it four wins in a row against Tottenham
desc: Bruno Fernandes has claimed he knew Michael Carrick would make a great manager after first working with him four years ago when he was Manchester United's interim boss.

title: Italy punish lacklustre Scotland in Rome rain
desc: Scotland open their Six Nations campaign in miserable fashion, going down 18-15 to Italy in rain-soaked Rome.

title: Q&A: Making Plant-Based Eating Practical in Pharmacy-Led Cardiometabolic Care
desc: Incremental, plant-based dietary changes can improve glycemic control, weight, and lipid outcomes while complementing cardiometabolic pharmacotherapy in routine pharmacy practice.

title: Fernandes keeps Carrick’s perfect Manchester United record intact after Romero red card
